questions.question: This type of neural network is commonly used for image recognition tasks.
questions.answer: What is a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)?

questions.question: This term refers to the process of adjusting the weights of a neural network based on the error of the output.
This type of neural network is designed to recognize patterns in sequences of data, such as time series or natural language.
questions.answer: What is a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)?

questions.question: This term refers to the function used to introduce non-linearity into a neural network model.
This type of neural network consists of multiple layers, including an input layer, hidden layers, and an output layer.
questions.answer: What is a Deep Neural Network (DNN)?
